original_text:
the oracle of him who hears the words of God,
    who sees the vision of the Almighty,
    falling down with his eyes uncovered:
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀을 듣는 자, 전능자의 환상을 보는 자, 엎드려서 눈을 뜬 자가 말하기를

sentences.original_text: who hears the words of God
who sees the vision of the Almighty
falling down with his eyes uncovered
